_header: Saint Aethelberht the holy king king was of England
Subjects: Aethelbert, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of St. Aethelberht in the South English Legendary — couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Seint Aylbriht þe holy kyng kyng was of EngelondeÞe
                    kynges sone Aylred þat gret pouwer hedde an honde…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Now God for þe loue of him to þulke ioye vs
                    bringeÞat his soule is to i went  aftur vr endynge.
                    AMEN.
BodEngPoeta1.Facsimiles:
Doyle,  I. A.,
                        ed.  
             The Vernon Manuscript. A Facsimile of Bodleian Library, Oxford, MS Eng.
                poet.a.1,
          with an introduction by A. I. Doyle. Cambridge: D. S. Brewer, 1987. 
Scase,  Wendy,  and  Nick Kennedy, eds.  
             A facsimile edition of the Vernon manuscript: Oxford, Bodleian Library, MS. Eng. Poet. A. 1.
         Oxford: The Bodleian Library, 2011.

CamTCC605.First Lines:
SEint albryȝt þe king was king of englondeÞe kinges
                    sone ayldred þat grete powere hadde an honde…
CamTCC605.Last Lines:
…now god for þe loue of hym to þulke Ioie ous
                    bringeþat his saule is to wente after oure endynge

BLCottJulDIX.First Lines: SEint ailbriȝt þe holi king king was in englondeþe kingis sone aildreþ þat gret poer hadde an honde…
BLCottJulDIX.Last Lines: …nou god for þe loue of him to such ioie ous bringeþat his soule is to ywent after our ending
BLCottJulDIX.Note: “Capitulum xCvii” added to left margin by later hand (f. 271v).
